item.title: UChicago Ethics Bowl Website
item.description: As the only CS major amongst our Ethics Bowl crew, I’ve been summoned to create our Ethics Bowl team website. Below is a sneak peek at the current design: Using my own custom HTML/CSS, I’m customizing the Dopetrope template from HTML5UP to suit our design needs. The color scheme consists of mainly UChicago brand colors. I plan to incorporate more custom JavaScript or React Native to make the landing page more dynamic, e.
